isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - DESCRIPTION - ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (COWL MOUNTED) WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED SWITCHES (AFTER JUNE 1994)

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (COWL MOUNTED) WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED SWITCHES (AFTER JUNE 1994)
svcproc.para: After June 1994, electric wipers are cowl mounted and the wiper/washer switches for the 5000 and 9000 models are located on the wing panel of the instrument panel to the right of the driver.
